summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1330, for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue Northeast from East Forty-fifth Street to East Fifty-sixth Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and by constructing concrete sidewalks, catch basins, inlets and other appurtenances therein under Ordinance No. 14976 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
